ComicInfo.Title: Visceral; Sticky Tape; Easy Beazy; Chateaubriand; Buster
ComicInfo.Summary: INCOMING: Oni’s subversive sci-fi delivery system, designate XINO #003! Justin Jordan (The Strange Talent of Luther Strode) and a surprise guest star wreak total havoc; Dan McDaid (DEGA) takes weaponized incompetence to the next level; David Hahn (Batman '66) walks a robot into a bar; Andrew Carl (Once Upon a Time Machine) and Sophie Franz (The Experts) unpack a locked-room mystery; Connor Willumsen (Bradley Of Him) digs deep into our capacity for self-delusion—ALL THIS AND MORE IN XINO'S EXPLOSIVE FINALE!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 05:47:49. [CVDB1010865] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 15:05:53. [Issue ID 2567678]
ComicInfo.Writer: Andrew Carl,Dan McDaid,David Hahn,Justin Jordan,Michael Conrad
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dan McDaid,David Hahn,Molly Mendoza,Shawn Kuruneru,Sophie Franz
ComicInfo.Inker: Dan McDaid,David Hahn,Molly Mendoza,Shawn Kuruneru,Sophie Franz
ComicInfo.Colorist: Dan McDaid,David Hahn,Molly Mendoza,Shawn Kuruneru,Sophie Franz
